main: With the Bio-Material. And the power of the orbs. And my very own soul.
I am part of the Daimaou, as you said. I wish to return to wholeness.
No... No, what do you mean you wish to return?
Everything I've worked for. I've burned every last bridge for the sake of this dream-
And you want to bring HIM back...!?
NO! NO! The one thing I do not regret is killing that man!
I'll tear you apart! I'll rip you to shreds before I have to see that face again!
